original_text: Yet he sent prophets to them, to bring them again unto the Lord; and they testified against them: but they would not give ear.
korean_text: 그러나 여호와께서 그들에게 선지자를 보내사 다시 여호와에게로 돌아오게 하려 하시매 선지자들이 그들에게 경고하였으나 듣지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: Yet he sent prophets to them
to bring them again unto the Lord
but they would not give ear
